Views are a very important part of the website. They provide the graphical user interface (what the client sees) using the data provided by the #data_model. Views are located in themes/name/views.

A view file may define multiple views. This can be used to group views together (for instance views that use the same model). Every view has its own function:

view_name ( model, iter, params )
model : the #DataModel for this view
iter : the #DataIter to be used by this view
params : a hash containing additional parameters

These functions simply echo whatever needs to send to the client.

Views can be used by using the #run_view function (located in include/functions.php).
